component.description: GMap component is built on Google Maps API Version 3. Gmap is highly integrated with JSF development model and enhanced with Ajax capabilities.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
model false org.primefaces.model.map.MapModel An org.primefaces.model.MapModel instance.
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the map container.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the map container.
type true java.lang.String Type of the map. Required.
center true java.lang.String Center point of the map. Required.
zoom true java.lang.Integer 8 Defines the initial zoom level. Default is 8.
streetView false java.lang.Boolean false Controls street view support. Default is false.
disableDefaultUI false java.lang.Boolean false Disables default UI controls. Default is false.
navigationControl false java.lang.Boolean true Defines visibility of navigation control. Default is true.
mapTypeControl false java.lang.Boolean true Defines visibility of map type control. Default is true.
draggable false java.lang.Boolean true Defines draggability of map. Default is true.
disableDoubleClickZoom false java.lang.Boolean false Disables zooming on mouse double click. Default is false.
onPointClick false java.lang.String Javascript callback to execute when a point on map is clicked.
fitBounds false java.lang.Boolean false Defines setting center and zoom values auto by included overlays on startup. Default value is false
